post.desc:
So [**Shukushin**](https://kotobank.jp/word/宿神-1173801) is basically a god of performing arts and music, and then eventually conflated with Matarajin. I guess that's the basis for the latter being associated with nōgaku?

Oh yeah. I also found out that "[**Okina**](https://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/翁#Japanese)" means old man. It seems the old man mask has a pretty significant symbolism.
